name: Deep Steam
description:
Reinvent yourself as a Victorian era "pest-controller" (a treasure hunter) and wear a fancy top hat. Deep Steam takes place in a reimagined London Underground where you fight rats with fancy weaponry to get to untouched treasures and mysteries. Watch your step!

I'm a student at Media Design School in New Zealand and an artist & developer by trade.

  • A couple of levels. 
    • The tavern - a place to grab a drink.
    • The infamous tutorial level.
    • The -infested- sewers.
  • Two weapons to choose from: an inaccurate pistol or a short range shotgun.
  • Quirky character sprites.
  • One enemy type: the rat!
  • Two NPCs: the sexy tavern keeper and the unimplemented merchant.
  • Pretty fun combat if I say so myself.
  • 10 awesome... mostly implemented items (no health pick ups, extra challenge!)

Movement: W A S D keys

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Dash/Dodge: Spacebar key

Interact: F key
